title: Video Of Mock Drill In Gujarat Temple Resurfaces As Foiled Terror Attack
subtitle: BOOM found that the video is originally of a mock drill that was carried out in the temple premises by Gujarat Police in March this year
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Two terrorists stormed Gujarat's Ma Ambaji temple. One was killed while the other was caught alive. Watch the video, bravo, Gujarat Police.

The video is originally of a mock drill that was conducted by the Banaskantha Police's Special Operations group in March this year. Gujarat Police quote tweeted the video in a tweet and clarified the same. BOOM had debunked the same video, that was viral earlier with a similar narrative. BOOM spoke to Ashish Rawal, media in-charge of Ambaji Temple Trust, at the time, who confirmed that a mock drill was carried out on March 29, ahead of the General Elections, 2019. "This is not the first time that such a demo has happened. However, since election is round the corner the police department chose to conduct a press conference and inform people that it was a mock drill and there is nothing to worry about."
